en: My dear, I've cleaned up after you every night these past two weeks. I didn't agree to be your servant just because you're fooling around with your little pet project! Step it up around here!

Thank you. We're a team. If we work together, we can both do the things we want to. I just never wanted to become the partner who doesn't have time for themselves because they have to do all the housework. Thank you for understanding.
I see. Well, see how productive you are when you have to do everything yourself!
